import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, } from "mdbreact"; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput } from "mdbreact"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addHistoryInApi } from "../../Action/historyActions"; class ModalEditProduct extends Component { state = { reference: this.props.reference, name: this.props.name, type: this.props.type, collection: this.props.collection, color: this.props.color, picture: this.props.picture, quantity: this.props.quantity, box: this.props.box, location: this.props.location, mesures: this.props.mesures, product_status: this.props.produit_status, brand: this.props.brand, }; render() { return ( this.props.toggle()} fullHeight position="top"> this.props.toggle()}> Ajouter nouveaux Article

this.props.toggle()}> Close { this.props.Addproduct({ reference: this.state.reference, name: this.state.name, type: this.state.type, collection: this.state.collection, color: this.state.color, picture: this.state.picture, quantity: this.state.quantity, box: this.state.box, location: this.state.location, mesures: this.state.mesures, product_status: this.state.produit_status, brand: this.state.brand, }); this.props.Addhistory({ action: "Edit", UserName: localStorage.getItem("UserName"), UserID: localStorage.getItem("UserID"), }); }} > Modifier produit ); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ user: state.user, }); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ Addhistory: (element) => dispatch(addHistoryInApi(element)), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(ModalEditProduct);
